runs.comm: starts off with a short of a length which shapes away as it is defended by Ali
defends this one away to the off side
gets England going with this push through mid-off for a couple
fancies himself as he looks to target the long on boundary with a hefty blow, as the ball catches the outside edge to fly over the slips through third man, but there is protection in the deep
short of a length delivery which is respected by Bell
keeps out this length delivery to end the opening over of this England chase

looks to force away a drive through the covers, but ends up getting away an outside edge as he arrived a touch late, with the ball continuing through third man for a boundary. Very streaky again from Moeen
short of a length which he is unable to get away off the square
drops his wrists to this back of a length which flies through him to the keeper
length delivery outside of off which is slapped away through backward point to beat the boundary rider at third man to the rope

gets some swing into the pads as Moeen is slightly late, with this one rapping him in front. Rubel goes up for it vociferously, with the umpire acquiescing soon after. Ali is not convinced though, as he asks for the review. Doesn't appear to be any inside-edge, but this just pitches outside of leg, but only just, as the decision is overruled. Good review that from England as Bangladesh would have been thoroughly overjoyed if they were one down
now looks to force away a drive through long off as Ali is able to come back for the second after the initial fumble
length delivery which is defended away by the batsman
short of a length and slanting down leg as he looked to glance this away
just short of a good length and outside off as Bell goes back in the crease and knocks it to cover
once again jabbed away off the back foot, but can't get it past the ring at cover
steers this fuller one through long on, with the intention of beating the mid-on fielder, but is unsuccessful in his attempt after the fielder put in the dive to his left
length ball which is defended away to the off side to end the over
short of a length which Bell is late on as this crashes into his thigh guard
straying on the legs as this is tickled behind through fine leg, or so it looks as leg byes are eventually called by the umpire
pushes at this length delivery rather aerially through gully, but there were no fielders close to it
rocks back to try and pull this shortish length through the leg side, but is unable to get it away
shorter one on middle and leg which Ali decides to leave well alone
gets away with this streaky inside-edge through fine leg to the boundary. Second time around he has got four thanks to the edge
half-volley outside of off which is lofted cleanly over extra-cover for four
tries to slap away through the off side, but is late on the delivery
defends this length delivery with a slightly angled face towards the off side
short of a length which is jabbed away by the batsman to the off side
short of a length and straying down the pads as this is turned away to the leg side
fends away this slightly back of a length softly onto the off side
defends away this back of a length to the off side
gets forward to negotiate this length delivery towards the off side
covers the line of this shortish length on and around off
flicks away this fuller one off the back foot to deep backward square
is watchful outside his off stump to this length delivery from Rubel
fires in a bouncer which sits up for Bell as he pulls this away fiercely to deep midwicket
tucks away this slower length ball from the bowler through the leg side with consummate ease
pushes away at this length delivery outside his off stump
punches away Mashrafe square off the wicket on the off side as this reaches the short boundary in no time. Too wide to a player of Bell's calibre
shortish length which is bunted away to the off side
Bell goes for another calculated strike, this time over extra-cover, as he lofts Mashrafe with ease for a boundary
these short boundaries are hurting Bangladesh as Bell gets into position superbly to punch away a drive off the back foot through the covers for four
drifts in one from round the wicket as Ali plays at this with soft hands

given plenty of flight as Ali advanced down to try and create a single through the leg side. Ali thinks a run is on offer as he takes a couple of steps, before seeing the fielder pickup the ball and position himself for a throw at his end. Bell was guilty of ball watching as Ali tries desperately to get back, and adds the dive for good measure, but the throw is just too good. Really silly way to get yourself out as the risk really wasn't worth the reward in the end. Big wicket that for Bangladesh
Hales wonder what is the big deal about playing a World Cup game as he crashes away this fractionally short delivery from Arafat through extra-cover for four
now pokes away at this one sliding down the leg side
tossed up outside off as Hales leans forward and gently drives it to short cover
turned away to the leg side to end a successful over for Bangladesh
decides to leave this delivery drifted in from outside off, as this just passes by the off stump, with Mushfiqur reacting quite strongly as he completed the take
punched back to the bowler, albeit quite carefully by the batsman
once again looks to back away to try and cut through cover, but is held by the close-in fielder
tossed up as Bell finally gets away a single on the off side
looking to caress away off the back foot once more, but picks out extra-cover
plays at this one with soft hands to end a good opening over for Shakib
strikes the bowler on and around off as there looked to be an inside-edge of the bat. Was deceived by the arm ball there
carefully negotiated to the off side by Bell
tries to carve away a single through the covers, but picks out silly mid-off
this time gets into a suitable position to guide this away through mid-off
goes for the inside-out drive which finds its way to the fielder at long off. Also gets England to their fifty
a touch short as this is struck away to the fielder at extra-cover
picks up a couple through midwicket with a clip to this leg-side delivery from Shakb
Hales pokes away at this one drifting in on middle as the ball ends at point, with a misfield ushering in the run
strides out to meet this one tossed up on and around off
backs away before playing this one back to the bowler in his follow through
Bell looking to play on the off side here as the angle suggests he would be better off to get this through the on side

looks for the sweep round the corner as he is struck on and around leg, with the angle of the delivery suggesting this would continue on quite comfortably. Bangaldesh go for the shout, but more hopeful than anything
greets the seamer with a streaky boundary through third man, as there was no protection in the deep. Got this away with a thick outside edge in the end
looks to steer away this length delivery past the man at point, but no can do
punches away now off the back foot, but can do no better than pinpoint the cover fielder
fuller length which is struck away off the back foot towards the close-in fielder on the off side
turns away this back of a length off the pads through deep midwicket
tries to guide this past point, but hits it a bit straighter to the fielder than he would have liked
gets away a run through backward square as he presented the bat, with this one getting an inside-edge
drives competently, but straight back to the bowler
now elects for the sweep round the corner, but short backward square keeps him honest
given some width outside of off as this is cut away late through backward point for a much-needed boundary for England
nicely defended as he got into good position for the delivery
again given width, but can't do any better than to carve this away off the back foot to the protection at deep cover
short of a length which is needled away square off the wicket on the off side
glides away a single now through the third man region
length delivery which shapes in as this is defended away through mid-off
fuller ball which is kept out by the front foot defense of Ian Bell
short of a length which is guided away square off the wicket to deep point
tries to caress away a boundary through cover now, but is held by the fielder on the ring
drifts in from outside off as he targets the acres of space at deep midwicket with a heave through the region to get four
carefully defended on the front foot by Bell
tries to tickle away a run through the leg side, but short fine leg is all over it
this time clips it away, but finds short mid-on now
eases away a single through long on to get to the other end
defends this one drifted in to the off side to end the over
sweeps this one just past the short backward square as the protection at deep square-leg has to come over to field it before the rope
defended with soft hands on the off side
takes all the pace of this one flighted in as Bell defends softly on the off side
rocks onto the back foot to cut away the bowler now to deep extra-cover
pushes away this one darted in just outside off
gets in a quicker delivery which is struck away to the fielder at mid-on
steers away a single through to deep extra-cover as Hales is brought on strike
tries to force away a drive past the bowler, but he pounces on this attempt with his full body
now works away the spinner towards the covers, but is stopped by the close-in fielder
this time negotiates the ball away to mid-on, as he continues to look for the gaps
takes the single down to long on as Sunny continues to keep things tight at one end

darts in a quicker one which manages to find the toe-end of Bell's bat as he tries to get this one away through third man, but is pulled back before the rope in the end. Doesn't stop them from securing three runs though
works away a single through the off side quite comfortably
defends this one away straight to the short mid-off fielder
waltzes down before defending this one which straightens outside of off stump
hangs on the back foot as this one is played back to the bowler in his follow through
eases away a single now off the back foot, with the midwicket fielder on the ring ensuring this was kept to just the one
manipulates this away through cover point now for one
slaps away a single off the back foot to the man at deep extra-cover
now punched away off the back foot to long on
changes his stance to play a short-arm jab of sorts through long on
another one eased in the same region, this time by Hales, as Sabbir put in the fruitless dive
drags the length a touch as Bell defends this one back to Sabbir
unable to get it through the gap at backward point as Bell runs the single on offer to move to 48
length delivery outside of off which is carved away through backward point
short of a length which is clattered away off the back foot through cow corner for four. Hales would be preferring this a lot more than the spinners
now cuts away a four over the man at backward point as he intentionally struck this into the ground to get it over, before the ball continued on to the boundary
content to just push away at this slightly back of a length to the off side

Mashrafe has the final laugh as Bangladesh pickup a wicket out of nowhere. Gets Hales to offer an outside edge which deflects away to the keeper, who takes it comfortably in the end. Bangladesh really needed that wicket as their body language started to lag a bit over the last few overs
fuller length outside of off as Root plays at this ball quite tentatively before it rushed through to the keeper
defended safely from within the confines of his crease
picks up a well-played fifty with a gentle clip through the leg side. England will need him to press on and guide them through the rest of this chase
carves away a single on the off side to get off the mark
met with the full face as this is fended away to the off side
tossed up just outside off as they are able to scamper another run through the off side. Also brings up the England 100, with polite applause going round the ground
picks up a run through extra-cover to retain the strike
tries to find a single through backward point, but locates the man right away
slices away this full, wide delivery from Mashrafe as gully tried his damndest to get at this as it continued through to third man
length delivery on and around off which is struck back to the bowler in his follow through
steers away a single off the back foot through backward point
defends this length delivery on and around the pads towards the leg side
gets into great position to drive this through the covers with the one flaw being that he found silly mid-on almost instantaneously
glides away a single to the protection at sweeper cover
looks to slap one away over the man at point, but he times his jump just perfectly to get at this
fuller now in the same channel as Root instinctively dabs this to the man at gully
fuller delivery which is driven towards long off, with Rubel slipping as he tried to get at it in his follow through
runs this length delivery through third man to pinch a single
gets nicely behind the line of this fuller one from Rubel to end the over
full and outside of off as this is driven straight to the man at cover
turns away this length delivery on middle and leg, but finds the close-in fielder on the leg side
dabs away a single through third man as he hares down to the other end to get his senior partner on strike
angling down the pads as Bell was targeting the gap at long leg with a flick, but the fielder from deep fine leg is able to come round to field this before the rope
slower delivery which Bell sees a bit late as he inside-edges onto the pads

another slow delivery as Bell checked his heave over long on, just getting this over, but strangely enough, after landing perhaps a few metres before the rope, this one just stays put a few inches from the rope, with the fielder chasing after it able to pick it up and throw it back. Bell sees this late and turns on the jets to try and compensate
picks up a single with a scythe behind of square on the off side
sends in a bumper which is dismissed from Root's presence as he pulls this away fiercely through midwicket
now sensibly works a single through the covers to get Bell back on strike
opens the face to run this slightly back of a length ball through the backward point region
looks to cut away this back of a length which was slanting into him. Really didn't have enough room there to get away the stroke
waits on the back foot as he bunts away this back of a length on the leg side
slower ball outside of off which is run down through third man

looked intent on gliding away a single through the same region, with the ball perilously close to the outside edge, as Taskin and keeper thought they might have had him, but replays confirm that wasn't the case
now cuts away hard through point, but the fielder is more than equal to the task
nurdles away a single through midwicket to get Root back on strike
cut away off the back foot as he ends up finding the fielder at point
Root able to negotiate this length delivery outside of off

shows just how damaging pace can be when you bowl in the right areas as he removes the Big Kahuna, who was looking to skip down and slap the bowler through the covers, before feeding an outside edge to the keeper behind. Ends a wonderful guiding hand as England now face a bit of pressure for the first time in this chase
gets on the front foot as this one is defended back to the bowler
short ball which doesn't quite carry over to the keeper as Eoin gives plenty of respect as he weaved out of its path

Rubel has become the star for these Bangladeshi masses as he gets Morgan to fall for the leg-side trap, sending in a short delivery which Eoin sends with a hook over to deep fine leg, who runs to his right before snapping this with both hands just over the rope as this was destined to go over for a maximum. Morgan departs without a run to his name, and England now in some trouble
sends in a yorker on middle and leg which Taylor, shuffling over to the off side, is able to get away through long on thanks to a misfield
just guides this past the outstretched hand of Rubel as he fell away in his follow through, as he keeps strike for the next over
tries to find the single through backward point, but to no avail
short of a length which is bunted away towards the off side
keeps plugging away on a length outside of off as Root finds the fielder once more
fires in an overpitched delivery which is met with the full face as he guides this through long on for three welcome runs
full again as this one is struck back to the bowler in his follow through
once again looks to force away on the off side, but picks out the fielder at point. The pressure is building on these two
plays away this length delivery to the man at mid-on
length outside of off, and angling in, as this is fended away by the batsman
fails to pick the space at backward point as he locates the gully fielder
picks the slightly short length early before dispatching Rubel quickly to the midwicket boundary with an authoritative pull. Looked quite classy as he pulled that off
fuller length now which Root tries to work away past the man at gully, but to no avail
wanted to heave this over mid-on before getting away an inside-edge through fine leg. Keeps him on strike though, which I am sure England won't mind terribly
pitched up by Taskin as this is driven back firmly to him
full again on middle and off as Root fails to get away the drive once more
slow delivery which is worked away square off the wicket on the leg side

now Taskin gets into act as Taylor threw his hands at this short of a length outside his off stump, with Kayes at slip doing no wrong to snaffle the chance. The stadium bursts into noise as Taylor has to make his exit, with England in real, serious trouble
fires in a short of a length outside of off which Joss wisely leaves well alone
shortish length which Jos is able to get bat on ball too as he scurries the quick single, with the bowler going after the ball in his follow through
struck away off the back foot towards the covers by the batsman
driven away on the front foot, but held in the same region once more
classy drive which does no better than find mid-off on the ring
short enough for Buttler to pull behind of square for a brace. Will need plenty more of those in the next few overs
shimmies over to the off side and down the wicket as he angles this away off the pads through fine leg
short again as this is worked away with a pull through to deep fine leg
waits on this length delivery before opening the face to dab this down through third man
picks the boundary at deep extra-cover with a wonderful, inside-out cover drive that just races away across the outfield, and the dive from the extra-cover fielder
waits on the front foot before knocking this away on the off side
Buttler now walks down before blazing away through the cover region to beat the sweeper cover to the rope
tries him out with a bouncer which Buttler is not keen to flirt with
gets onto the back foot to needle away a single on the off side
flighted in on off as Buttler is given no room to work away a stroke
gets away a drive now through to deep extra-cover
unable to get away this one tossed up on and around off stump
guides away a single through the off side to turn over the strike
advances down before drilling this to the fielder at deep extra-cover. Also gets England to their 150
turns away this one sliding across to end the over
tries to get this one past the bowler, who ends up misfielding after flopping on the ball
gets deep in his crease to try and get this past short backward square, but no can do
now looks for the cut away through to mid-off as they rotate the strike
comes down before easing this away to long off
waits on it before directing this away off the back foot through to long on
steers away a single through to midwicket
flighted on middle and off as this is worked away towards long off
gets in a stride before finding the man again with a drive
slows this one in the air as this is dabbed away through the off side
driven firmly down to long off as they continue to milk the singles
given plenty of air as Buttler is able to steer this away to long off once more
Root able to nurdle a run to the same fielder to keep the strike ahead of the Batting Powerplay
tucks away a single through midwicket to get Buttler on strike
slow, fuller delivery outside of off as Jos tries to get this away through third man. There is a loud appeal by the bowler after he thought there was a nick, but the keeper didn't seem so interested
slanting down the pads now as this is helped away behind of square

and Mortaza produces the goods once again in the first over of a fresh spell as he succeeds in getting Root to play at this one which just holds its line after being bowled on a fuller length. Mushfiqur is able to take this from behind as Bangladesh exult with joy across the field. Really big wicket as Root was settling in for the potential heist later on
acrobatic stop at backward point as Bangladesh's body language is right up there as Woakes looked to dab this away
gets another edge to this slower, back of a length as it falls safely to the feet of the slip in place
rocks back before working this away through the mid-on region
eases away a run off the back foot, this time through long on
gets in a good stride to keep out this quicker one from Shakib
flatter one which drifts in on middle and off as this is struck away to the off side
flighted delivery outside of off stump. Woakes drives it into the off-side, but can't pinch the run
times this slightly wide line away through backward point, with the fielder on the boundary putting in a dive to cut this off in the end
fends away this Mashrafe speical onto the off side
able to steer away a run through cover to get Buttler on strike
advances down before clipping this away through to the fielder at deep midwicket

slower, full delivery which Buttler tried to force away on the up, but didn't account for the change in pace as Mashrafe gets hit on the right knee as he tried in vain to get to this chance. Hard to call it dropped, as it was more of a half-chance
gets down the track before readjusting to fend away this short of a length towards mid-on
finishes off the over with a dot as the pressure continues to heap on England
gets a single away through the off side
guides away now through the cover region to get Buttler back on strike
patient as he helps this one drifted in down to long on
tucked away off the pads to deep midwicket as they turn the jets on for the first run to come back in time for the second
nurdled away towards mid-on, but can't scamper the run
leans forward before placing this to the same fielder as the delivery before
fuller length which is helped down to the extra-cover fielder

has a waft at this length delivery which just nips away as the ball carried through to the keeper. Mashrafe doesn't seem bothered to appeal though, despite the huge interest from the fans at the ground
short of a length which is struck away off the back foot to backward point
carves away a single square off the wicket on the off side
keeps out this latest Mashrate special on a length outside off

gets down the track to clip this away to deep midwicket as Mashrafe's spell comes to a close, with his team coming round to congratulate him. Has taken two crucial wickets to give Bangladesh control so far
where did that come from? Buttler show why he can be so dangerous in these circumstances as he gets down the track before clearing the extra-cover boundary with ease
now gets away a drive through long off, with Woakes ushering him to come back for the second as he was racing to the danger end. Able to get across the line with a dive
now forces away a stroke through long on as Woakes takes the hot seat
advances down once more before executing the orthodox drive towards long off
guided away to the fielder in the deep at extra-cover
tossed up as Woakes came down the track, but is unable to do much with this as it finds the close-in fielder on the off side
dishes out a low full toss as he looked for the yorker, with this one struck away to long off. Woakes able to return back for the second to keep Jos on strike
tries to work away this slightly short of a length, as he ends up being late on the ball as it rushed past the outside edge
demonstrates one of his signature paddles over fine leg as he got out of the way, keeping his head still, before lifting this Dilly style over fine leg, with this just getting to the rope in the end
pitches it up outside off as this is drilled down to long off
given some width outside of off which Woakes is able to slash away through deep extra-cover for four
overpitched again as this one is sent straight to the mid-off fielder, who gets his body behind it to earn a dot for Bangladesh
Buttler manages to get to his fifty as he hammers away this slightly short of a length through deep midwicket for four
picks up a run on the leg side to get Woakes on strike
waited on the back foot before cutting away powerfully through extra-cover
gets away with this edge to this attempted late cut, but picks out the man at gully
driven inside-out through to the man at deep extra-cover
clips away this one sliding down the pads towards the fella at deep midwicket
targets the long on boundary with a heave that goes higher than farther as this one pulls up before the rope in the end
fires in a pacey, full delivery outside of off which the batsman is late on as he looked to scythe it away
low, full toss slipping down the leg side as this is tickled away through fine leg
searching for the blockhole as this low, full toss is dug out towards mid-on
sometimes you need luck at this stage as he squeezes away at this fuller length outside of off which bursts through the gap at gully to find the third man boundary. Releases some pressure for England
and again from Buttler, this time intentional as he slices this away through the same gap to make it consecutive boundaries. The Rubel move has backfired here for Bangladesh
targets the boundary at extra-cover with a firm drive, but there is protection there
flighted up on middle and leg which is respected by the batsman
eases away a single now through long on
bowled wide of off as Woakes fails to get away this full-blooded drive through extra-cover
decides to just steer away Shakib through long on to get off the strike
another single pinched down to long on as England now make it 47 off 30 to win
slower, full toss which dips on the batsman as this is forced away through the covers
gives this one plenty of welly outside his off stump as he is able to power this over extra-cover for four. Delayed his shot when he realised this was another slower ball from the bowler
able to spear in a yorker on middle and leg which is dug away towards the off side
finds the blockhole, but only just, as Buttler is able to work this down to long on, with the batsmen hustling the first to get back for the second in time

Taskin might just well be the toast of Dhaka tonight as he induces an outside edge to this attempted dab from Jos, who looked in two minds as to whether to go back or forward to this slightly back of a length outside his off stump. Met with wild jubilation from the Adelaide crowd as Bangladesh now go just ahead on the cards

Jordan gets into a mix-up as he works away this back of a length to the off side, going down the track in hopes of Woakes reciprocating, but when he sees him stay put, is forced to get back to his end, putting in a dive before the direct hit took shape. The umpire wants to be careful though as he looks at the replays, which show that the bat may have just turned on Jordan as he attempted to make his ground, with the angle suggesting he might not have had the relevant portion of the bat on the ground when the bails were disturbed. I wouldn't want to be a third umpire right now. Huge decision in the context of the game. The result has come in, and it is given out, which is greeted with a huge roar across the ground. Jordan can't believe it, but he has to go.
Woakes reminds the Adelaide crowd he is still around with a powerful sweep through backward square to find the boundary
now guided away through long off, exposing Broad, who is now on the hot seat
guides away a single now square off the wicket to get off the mark
fails to dig out this one darted in just outside of off, with Mushfiqur running back after this bounced over
bowls another dot which has Woakes under a bit of pressure now
gets this one wrong as he offers a full toss which is slapped away, but not well enough to pierce the boundary at deep extra-cover, as there was protection out there
fires in a yorker just outside of off which the batsman is able to get bat on as they scurry through for the run

shortish length which Broad manages to pull high over midwicket, with this just carrying over to the rope to give England half a dozen. Really tilts the scales with that strike. Taskin now under pressure
full delivery down the leg side which is tickled away through fine leg for a brace
looks like the situation is getting to Taskin as he delivers an above-waist height full toss which is sliced away off the back foot through third man

dropped Tamim might just have cost Bangladesh the match as he bobbles this attempted bludgeon over long on, with this landing to him in the region, after being in the air for a little while. Ends up bursting through his hands as the ball carried a bit more than he had expected
fires in a yorker on middle which is just dug out as they scurry through for the tight single. There is a shy at Broad's end from the bowler, but he misses
slower, back of a length delivery which Broad is able to get bat on ball too as they scamper through for another tight single, reducing the equation to a very manageable 16 off 12

The men in green are on top once more as Rubel delivers a 142 kph length straight on the stumps which Broad plays all around. Met with huge celebrations across the ground as the balance shifts once more towards Bangladesh
goes for the yorker, although misses the mark slightly as Anderson had a flick at it, with this continuing through to the slip in place
and Rubel has knocked the England lions out of the 2015 World Cup with a full, almost yorker-length ball which castles Jimmy as he looked to get it away through the off side
